subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Cycling, Road
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Chris Froome leads a group of young riders looking to break out at the Tour de France, but the veteran Alberto Contador will be among those giving chase.
snippet: Chris Froome leads a group of young riders looking to break out at the Tour de France, but the veteran Alberto Contador will be among those giving chase.
